text: thumb Gabriel Biancheri (October 1, 1943, Oullins - Rhône December 28, 2010) was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the 4th constituency of the Drôme department, as a member of the Union for a Popular Movement, from 2002 until his death in 2010. He was succeeded in the constituency by his substitute in the 2007 election, Marie-Hélène Thoraval. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2010 deaths Category:People from Oullins Category:Politicians from Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes Category:Rally for the Republic politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Gabriel Biancheri
